q:
Consider the following series of numbers.
A: "6, 15, 21, 36, 57, 93, 150......"

The series is encoded into a new series B as follows:
B: " 2, 3, 3, 2, 3, 3, 3, X "

Identify the next element X in series B from the choices provided.

What will be the value of X in the arithmetical number series given below:
3/8, 3/16, 3/32, X, 3/64, 3/80

What will be the next number in the following number series:

13, 22, 40, 67, 103, ?

Determine the value of X in the arithmetical number series given below:

88, 71, X, 43, 32, 23

Find out the wrong number in the given number series:
72, 120, 48, 76, 24, 16

Determine the wrong number in the below given number series:
6783, 3315, 1289, 315, 15

You are given the following series:

2, 9, 34, 16, 23, 34, 30, 37, X, Y

Select the appropriate value of X and Y from the choices provided.

What can be used in place of XXX to complete the given alphanumeric series:
CE16, EG24, GI32, XXX

Which alphanumeric term is wrong in the series given below?

XS5, RH10, GB8, AU20

Determine the next term in the given series:
19, 38, 114, 456, ?

What is the next term in the series given below:
38, 18, 27, 11, X

Pick out the odd one among the following set of numbers:
16, 4, 23, 7, 30, 11, 37, 13, 45

What will be the next number in the following number series?

3, 13, 50, 148, ?

You are given the following series:
6, 5, 6, 9, X, 75, 414, 2829...
Select the appropriate value of X from the choices provided.

What will be the next number in the following number series:
6.5, 3.75, 2.375, 1.6875, ?

Determine the missing item in the series given below.

ZWT, SPM, ___, EBY

What will be the next term in the below given series:
14, 15, 24, 49, 392, X
